19:["$","div",null,{"className":"flex-1 min-w-0","children":["$","p",null,{"className":"text-[15px] leading-[1.75] whitespace-pre-line text-slate-700 dark:text-slate-200","children":["I'm evaluating project management tools for our product team and I'm stuck between monday.com and ClickUp. On paper, ClickUp seems like the obvious choice:\n\n• More features (docs, whiteboards, email built-in)\n• Lower price ($7 vs $8 per seat)\n• More customizable\n\nBut monday.com seems more polished and easier to adopt. My team isn't super technical, so ease of use matters.\n\nHas anyone compared both recently? What are the real differences in day-to-day use?\n\nOur needs:\n• Sprint planning and backlog management\n• Roadmap visualization\n• Integration with GitHub\n• Time tracking\n• Good mobile experience"]}]}]
